name: SteelArrow Web Application File
summary: An ARO file is a webpage that includes SteelArrow code. It usually contains mostly HTML with a small portion of SteelArrow tags and scripts. ARO files are processed on the server before being sent to a user's web browser, similar to .PHP or .ASP pages.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Windows Server with Tomahawk Technologies SteelArrow
